name: Stuck in the Maze
description:
You are stuck in the maze. You have to find the teleporter to get out. The good news is, you have device with a map of the maze. Bad news - battery of the device is very weak, so you can use it for only 10 seconds.

Controls:
arrows/WSAD - move
Shift - run
Hold LMB - minimap

Textures: http://www.textures.com/

Author: Tomasz Trzaska
